summary: This document is an email chain from September 12, 2019, discussing a New York Post article about a pregnant victim of Jeffrey Epstein who was allegedly made to recruit underage girls. The correspondence involves individuals from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York inquiring about how much of the article's content was repeated in an interview with the victim.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the article discussed in the email; described as having lost interest in a pregnant victim and making her recruit underage girls.

events.title: New York Post article publication
events.description: The New York Post publishes an article titled 'Jeffrey Epstein lost interest in pregnant victim, made her recruit underage girls'.

keyFacts: A New York Post article from September 12, 2019, alleges Jeffrey Epstein lost interest in a pregnant victim and made her recruit underage girls.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York is discussing the article and comparing it to an interview they conducted with the victim.
The email chain indicates ongoing investigation or interest by federal prosecutors regarding victim testimony and media reports.
